org.aksw.fox.nertools

Interface InterfaceNER

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractNER, NERBalie, NERIllinois, NEROpenNLP, NERStanford

    public interface InterfaceNER
    An interface for the use of a ner tool. The method retrieve(String input) can be used to get the result list of Entity objects.
    Author:
    rspeck

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Set<Entity> getResults()
      Returns results.
      java.lang.String getToolName()
      Returns the tools name.
      java.util.Set<Entity> retrieve(java.lang.String input)
      Retrieves Entity objects from the give input String with sentences as plain text.
      void setCountDownLatch(java.util.concurrent.CountDownLatch cdl)
      Sets a CountDownLatch object.
      void setInput(java.lang.String input)
      Sets the input with sentences as plain text.
